Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I've had 3 other tablets that were priced WAYYYY more than what they should have been.  This one does just fine.  I just wish the camera was a little better.
Reviews.Title: Decent price for a decent brand

Reviews.Author: David West "Hard to please"
Reviews.Content: I guess it is great for an under $100 tablet.  It freezes fairly often and is pretty slow for some functions. But,it is good for checking email and doing light web browsing.
Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Author: DOUGLAS R BROWN
Reviews.Content: Badly made the charger port is poorly made and will give out,so you can no longer charge the unit very disappointing beware of poor Lenovo manufacturing
Reviews.Title: Stay away

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich 7 inches Display

ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo Idea Tablet A1107 7-Inch 16 GB Tablet (Black)
